name: Curios Labs Limited
description: Operator of a news platform intended to transform news and publications into audio journalism. The company's platform personalizes the curated articles according to the users' interests from various global publications that are narrated by professional voice actors, enabling users to listen to the news offline and stay updated with current affairs.
one_liner: Operator of a news platform intended to transform news and publications into audio journalism. The company's platform personalizes the curated articles according to the users' interests from various global publications that are narrated by professional voice actors, enabling users to listen to the news offline and stay updated with current affairs.

name: Synervoz Communications Inc.
description: Developer of an innovation & software studio intended to focus on audio, entertainment, and online collaboration. The company has designed, developed, and co-created apps, SDKs, and embedded products with complex audio pipelines focused on custom engineering solutions for other companies and source code that can be licensed or purchased outright, enabling clients to have access to applications that are balanced in real-time and offers non-live content that can be synchronized between parties.

industry: AI/Machine Learning, AudioTech, Developer Tools, Gaming, No Code, Telecommunications, Deep Tech, Augmented Reality / Virtual Reality, Entertainment / Media, Consumer, Network Effects

name: HAAWK, Inc.
description: Operator of a copyright administration, management, and licensing platforms. The company monitors, monetizes and enforces users' copyrights on user-generated content platforms including YouTube, Facebook/Instagram, and TikTok via the brands HAAWK, Identifyy, Keyframe Audio, and Diistro.
